name: Cross Border Benefits Alliance - Europe
goal:
The Cross Border Benefits Alliance - Europe (CBBA-Europe) is a Brussels based AISBL aiming to promote the creation of cross border employee benefits in Europe (including cross border/pan-European pension funds, healthcare plans, unemployment benefits programs, etc.).
In other words, CBBA is promoting the possibility for employee benefits' plans to operate across the borders of the EU and to cover workers and consumers based in different EU member states at the same time.

Moreover, CBBA-Europe represents a laboratory of different solutions and experiences in the social protection field adopted by its members: some of them, after being agreed by the CBBA's Management Board will be proposed as good practices to the national and EU decision makers.

interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Single market, Taxation
